scripts.preinstall: npm run installPreprocessors && npm run installVsCodeExts
scripts.installPreprocessors:default:win32: npm install -g typescript && npm install -g prettier && npm install -g less
scripts.installPreprocessors:darwin:linux: sudo npm install -g typescript && sudo npm install -g prettier && sudo npm install -g less
scripts.purge:default:win32: if exist _out\ rmdir _out /s /q && if exist _api\ rmdir _api /s /q
scripts.build: npm run purge && npm run compile
